description:
Cloud gaming is truly impressive tech under ideal conditions. Both Microsoft and Nvidia are working on their respective offerings, ostensibly competing with each other via Xbox Game Pass and GeForce Now.

Yet despite being competitors, both companies are also deeply committed to PC gaming as a platform. In that context, it makes sense that Microsoft would use its own website to highlight games that work on Nvidia’s streaming service.

That’s according to a tweet from the official Xbox account, showing off new functionality on the Microsoft game gallery (spotted by The Verge). Now when you click the “PLAY with CLOUD” launch button on a game&
title: Xbox.com can now launch streaming GeForce Now games

title: 7 nifty Windows File Explorer tips to keep under your belt

description:
Quick Answer: What’s the best way to record video from any website?

Screen recording online is one of the most popular ways to access and download video or audio materials on a website, as you don’t need to download a program on a PC or Mac to achieve it. An online screen recorder is usually free and fully compatible with all kinds of websites through different web browsers. It’s also easy to handle.

  • Launch a web browser
  • Open the target website or specific web page
  • Click a Record button
  • Complete the recording task and save the recordings

Online resources you might want to capture include lectures, meetings, webinars, and live streams. For post-editing purposes or to
title: Record Video from Websites on Various Devices

description:
You could say we’re in the honeymoon phase of an AI PC boom, with AI chip technologies and software in a state of rapid and perpetual improvement in laptops.

At least that was the vibe I got at HP’s Imagine AI event in New York City last week, where HP personnel were talking up the current AI PC technologies and teasing what’s to come in the AI PC space later this year.

“This is one of the biggest, most dynamic inflection points I’ve ever seen in my career. There’s stuff on the front burner in the AI category coming soon, even later this year, including even more AI performance in consumer laptops and workstations,” said Alex Thatcher, senior director of cloud client and AI experience at HP.

“We’re also going to see big innovations around AI PC security and you’re also going
title: HP: AI TOPS will plateau, but innovation in AI will continue

description:
Today, you can ask Microsoft Copilot to draw an AI-generated image of a strawberry pie for free, right from within Windows. But if you want to do the same thing in Microsoft Word, it will cost you at least 26 dollars per month. Does that make sense to you?

AI art has existed within Microsoft’s ecosystem since 2022, when Microsoft released its first beta of Microsoft Bing Image Creator. That later became Microsoft Designer, the design tool that Microsoft developed to compete against Canva. This week, Microsoft said that
title: Microsoft wants you to pay $300 per year for AI art in Word
